name: Dr. Soumen Rej
about: Dr. Soumen Rej, currently working as Assistant Professor in School of Business, UPES and defended Ph.D. thesis at the Vinod Gupta School of Management, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur, earned B.Tech in Electrical Engineering and M.Tech in Industrial Engineering and Management from West Bengal University of Technology (India), ranking second in his class to receive the Silver Medal from the University. He has also worked as a Research Fellow at Central Power Research Institute, Government of India. His research interests include Economics of Climate Change, Energy Policy, Energy Economics, advanced econometrics methods and Sustainability. He has the software proficiency of Python (advanced level), EVIEWS(advanced level), STATA(advanced level), R(beginner level), SPSS(beginner level). He also knows different MCDM techniques (TOPSIS, MTOPSIS, AHP, Fuzzy TOPSIS).
